title: My Website
description: A website I independently developed to showcase the projects and work I have completed over the years, including the implementation and visualization of various algorithms. Additionally, the site provides links and information about myself.

title: Bachelor's Thesis In Computer Science & Engineering
description: A Comparison of Approaches to Image Classification using Convolutional Neural Networks

title: Calculator in Python
description: I developed a simple calculator utilizing Reverse Polish Notation (RPN) for efficient arithmetic operations. This calculator demonstrates an alternative computational method by eliminating the need for parentheses in mathematical expressions.
